snippet.title: Top 10 All Time Greatest Movies About Music
snippet.description:
From vinyl obsessions to jazz drumming intensity, these films hit all the right notes! Join us as we count down our picks for the greatest movies about music. Our list celebrates fictional films about performing and loving music, not biopics or documentaries. Our countdown includes "High Fidelity," "Inside Llewyn Davis," "Once," "That Thing You Do!," "School of Rock," "The Blues Brothers," "Whiplash," "This Is Spinal Tap," "Almost Famous," and more! These films showcase everything from record shop obsessives to struggling folk musicians, aspiring drummers to fictional rock bands. What's your favorite music movie? Let us know in the comments!
